"Look out Aerotaur..." said Windlord "We don't know how dangerous he 
could be... But I'm ready to face him"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     He lands next to Windlord.  He transforms into bot mode.  "Hey 
I finally 
> got that down."  He draws his staff and he can instinctively tell 
that this 
> dark bot is evil.  "Prepare to die!"
